column4: We have a problem with our thin clients,  It seems like each user has 2 instances of the process "ps" running.. using 2% cpu each.. as you imagine..this is a problem when there is 30 users logged on.. cpu load is at 90-100%  what can i do?
clients authenticates with M$ AD, trough the ltsp server
is it all handled by ltsp? if so maybe ask in #ltsp
